short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly search other platforms from the main search bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Type two periods in the search bar
2. Press the space bar
3. Enter your search term
4. Select where to search using the arrow keys or mouse

Platforms can be customized in the Settings.
